review:
I was very worried about my teeth, showed many doctors one day someone gave me reference to Dr. Pratik Aggarwal sir so I went there after that they checked my teeth, they were very Mal-Aligned and completely Asymmetrical while chewing and biting as well as in Smile also, so he told me that there is an orthodontic treatment of 3-3.5 years on average and braces will be applied and your teeth will be fine. I was so pleased with his words and his behavior after that I took my complete treatment there. My treatment is complete today.
Now my teeth are not the same as before, now my teeth are unrecognizable after orthodontic treatment.I am very satisfied with my treatment.
Dr Pratik Sir taught me so much about Dentistry and In my journey of Braces that I have a lot of information about dentistry now and his staff is very nice and explain very well always organised in aligning my appointment on time because after one year I was coming from my hometown sometime during this journey I was apprehensive and concerned for myself now how this will finish in proposed time but sir was always keen in giving me time and best treatment to me always my treatment actually finished in 2 years approximately
Iam seriously thankful for his positive environment in his clinic the Aura is having good vibes and again Iam thankful to
Dr.Pratik Aggarwal sir and his staff from the bottom of my heart .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,RCT - Single Sitting,Aesthetic Dentistry,Zirconia Crowns,
review:
Dr.Pratik Aggrawal is very Professional and Very Sincere and Disciplined Doctor, He organised my Treatment plan by taking my Complete medical history 
In my life I have already shown to 4 Different Dentist before coming to Dr.Pratik.
As I was already suffering from TMJ joint issue as well their is clicking sound I use to hear on and off and iam having Headaches also because of this, firstly he advised for my complete Full mouth X-Ray and then He discussed his Treatment plans by calling Specialist also for my work Whatever he do he explains thoroughly and Gently as he‚Äôs an Orthodontist but he actually have good habit to deal with his patients ,he gives time and have passions while carefully listening to my 17-18 years of Problems in my life , every field of specialists and dentists is connected  with Dr.Pratik Aggrawal and they also admire and genuinely I will say a good team work i had noticed in his Environment. He‚Äôs very spiritual and He give strong hope and faith for his patient treatment , he‚Äôs has a good aura and his conversation with patient will definitely make you positive. 
Full mouth Rehabilitation is done and I have got Zirconia Crown and Bridge in my mouth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited so many doctors. But he's the most satisfied one I found. He treat his patients very calmly and composed way. 
In my journey, there's no shortcut he already advised me. He advised me the treatment for 1-2 years.
But the result started coming before that. 
Sir is very protective and he treats me like a family always.
Regarding my naniji and for my mother. They have also taken the treatment from him.
He also give personal touch and explained everything in detail.
He's just like my brother who treats me very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am very happy and satisfied with the treatment . In this journey of 2 years with aligners ,plus sir has given me an ample amount of time. Before starting the treatment i was very confused that should i take the treatment or not as my family is very afraid of dentists but sir gave me and my family the confidence to opt for the treatment.
During my journey I faced lot of issues with the aligner company but sir always stood up for me whenever i needed. They fought with the company to change the plan according to our needs . He really called me many times that things are going north and according to the plans Because of that we are able to reach the desired result. I am very delighted to have a doctor and mentor like him by my side. Love ‚ù§Ô∏è and Respect ü´° to you Sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have  severe pain before meeting dr.pratik aggrawal after treatment i feel very good 
Sir is very nice ,humble,and very helpful ,treat like a brother/friend
Special care about patient love is always for him ,and sir is with me in entire life wherever iam staying in world. Thanku

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted three different doctors, one of which said nothing can be done and I'd have to live with my current condition forever which naturally made me very sad, before coming to Pratik sir. I clearly remember him saying that it isn't that bad and can be fixed I give enough time. I didn't know if what he said at time was true or not but it gave me enough hope to get braces and now after three years , I can say that it was true because it has been fixed. Sir has always explained to me the process , what they're trying to do, how they're doing it which always gave me a sense of assurance. I'm extremely satisfied with how the treatment turned out and those three years were worth it. I'd highly recommend sir to anyone who's scared of taking the first step towards the betterment of their teeth because sir knows how to push you and how to achieve the goals.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Scaling / Polishing,
review: *** ****** ******** ** ** ********* ******** He took the time to explain every procedure he was doing. For example, when I got my teeth RCT+ BRIDGE work Dr.Pratik Aggrawal was very supportive and thoroughly explains the process to me. He is a professional and have a naturally lovely personality. I would recommend Dr. Pratik Aggrawal  to everyone. ** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****I visited the Teeth Heaven Multispeciality Dental Clinic in old rajinder nagar by making an online appointment for getting the RCT+ BRIDGE work and also cleaning for my teeth and I would say it was one of the best experience I ever had. Doctors are very generous and enthusiastic,They even try to give always the best and worthy advise.I would like to recommend the clinic to my friends and family for sure .Its a high quality dental clinic with an experienced and highly qualified dentists.**** ****** ****** **** they have got with in-house best technology available *** *** ******* *** ** **** I had for my treatment here spending for almost more then 1 year but I don't have any problems developed till now for my crown and bridge work. Thank you soo much Dr. Pratik Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent Treatment. Last year I came to Dr. Prateek for wisdom tooth removal. The treatment was very good without any complications. Later I had to visit again for another molae treatment and for crown and bridge. This also went really well. **** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** **** ** *** *** ******* *** **** ********* **** **** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had a very pleasant experience with Dr. Pratik Aggrawal and his staff. My brother was very anxious about the appointment and any procedure, but Dr. Pratik Aggrawal was very patient with him and spend a lot of time trying to gives the best treatment, the staff was very highly educated helpful and kind and always available to help. Dr. Pratik Aggrawal is very professional, he takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice , It's not easy to find a good dentist for your treatment, I highly recommend Dr. Pratik Aggrawal and his staff for everyone.My Brother's treatment is the best pain free treatment. I am so impressed for my brother's dental treatment in Teeth Heaven Multispeciality Dental Clinic old rajinder nagar and thanks to Dr. Pratik Aggarwal *** ** *** **** *** highly educated doctor in New Delhi.
